name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is a vintage oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its classic box-shaped body, soldier-like arms and legs, and a laser screen, Retrotron is a throwback to the golden age of technology. Its retro console buttons add a touch of nostalgia and style to its appearance. As a member of the WebtrES club, Retrotron is equipped with advanced abilities and skills, making it a valuable asset for any digital endeavor.
